title: CT4Rec: Simple yet Effective Consistency Training for Sequential Recommendation. (arXiv:2112.06668v2 [cs.IR] UPDATED)
abstract: Sequential recommendation methods play an important role in real-world recommender systems. These systems are able to catch user preferences by taking advantage of historical records and then performing recommendations. Contrastive learning(CL) is a cutting-edge technology that can assist us in obtaining informative user representations, but these CL-based models need subtle negative sampling strategies, tedious data augmentation methods, and heavy hyper-parameters tuning work. In this paper, we introduce another way to generate better user representations and recommend more attractive items to users. translated_title: CT4Rec: 简单而有效的顺序推荐一致性训练
translated_abstract: 顺序推荐方法在现实世界的推荐系统中发挥着重要作用。这些系统通过利用历史记录来捕捉用户偏好，然后进行推荐。对比学习（CL）是一种先进的技术，可以帮助我们获得有信息量的用户表示，但这些基于CL的模型需要精细的负采样策略、繁琐的数据增强方法和大量的超参数调整工作。在本文中，我们提出了另一种方法来生成更好的用户表示，并向用户推荐更有吸引力的物品。特别地，我们提出了一种在顺序推荐中使用的有效的一致性约束（C$^2$-Rec），其中只使用了两个额外的训练目标，而没有进行任何结构修改和数据增强策略。我们在三个基准数据集和一个真实工业数据集上进行了大量实验，证明了我们的方法的有效性。
tldr: 本文提出了一种简单而有效的顺序推荐一致性训练方法，通过引入一致性约束（C$^2$-Rec），只使用两个额外的训练目标，而不需要进行结构修改和数据增强策略，从而生成更好的用户表示并向用户推荐更有吸引力的物品。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a simple yet effective consistency training method for sequential recommendation, which introduces consistency constraint (C$^2$-Rec) using only two additional training objectives without structural modifications and data augmentation strategies, generating better user representations and recommending more attractive items to users.
